page.title: 14Coaley - a profile
page.content: Coaley has a population of around 900 people. During the last 10 years there have been no major changes and most of the houses are between 10 and 400 years old. The development of The Close some 10 years ago brought many new people to the village mostly from outside Gloucestershire. Most people travel to work by car. The easy access to motorway and other main routes putting Coaley within easy reach of many major towns including Bristol, Cheltenham and Gloucester. Apart from the local farmers, a few farm labourers, the shopkeeper, the publican and the mill owner very few people live and work in the village. Many retired people live here. Coaley in the 1980's is a pleasant, busy and friendly place to live.
